dct_title_s: Map of southern Peru to accompany Mr. Markham's paper
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Railways from Mollendo to Puno, Ylo to Moquegua, and Arica to Tacna, and major waterways are shown. Includes elevation profile: Section of railway from Arequipa to Puno [horizontal scale ca. 1:1,487,000; vertical scale ca. 1:119,300]. Major settlements along railway are marked. From: The Journal of the Royal Geographical Society of London. Vol. 44 (1874), pp. 127-32; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J687 v.44 1874
